hooks.command: jq -r '.tool_input.file_path' | xargs -I {} sh -c 'case "{}" in *.py) black "{}" && isort "{}" ;; *.ts|*.tsx|*.js|*.jsx) npx prettier --write "{}" ;; *.go) gofmt -w "{}" ;; *.rs) rustfmt "{}" ;; *.java) google-java-format -i "{}" ;; *.css|*.scss) npx prettier --write "{}" ;; *.json|*.md|*.yaml|*.yml) npx prettier --write "{}" ;; esac'
